document.full_text: the united states supreme court granted a stay of execution for daniel w. cook, who was scheduled to be executed tuesday for killing a man and a teenage boy in 1987.
document.title: southwest: arizona: death row inmate wins stay
lines_and_colors: the united states supreme court granted a stay of execution for daniel w. cook, who was scheduled to be executed tuesday for killing a man and a teenage boy in 1987.
